docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 17 -- The Soviet delegation is preparing to press for a concerted campaign by the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization against war-mongering propaganda. The Russians contend it is being spread by...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 17 -- The Soviet delegation is preparing to press for a concerted campaign by the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization against war-mongering propaganda. The Russians contend it is being spread by "certain countries" through the press, radio and movies.
docs.abstract: USSR to offer resolution, UNESCO conf, condemning propaganda

headline.main: PROPAGANDA CURB ASKED; Soviet Wants Unesco to Vote Ban on War-Mongering

docs.snippet: The Americas stand at the threshold of the Economic Conference to be held at Rio de Janeiro. The baffling economic problems which Latin-American nations will present at this conference preclude any simple solutions. Yet our nation, the United States,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Americas stand at the threshold of the Economic Conference to be held at Rio de Janeiro. The baffling economic problems which Latin-American nations will present at this conference preclude any simple solutions. Yet our nation, the United States, will inevitably be the center of attention and the source of hope.

docs.snippet: Activity in the foreign exchange market during the past week was extremely light with transactions reported as being mostly routine. British pound sterling fluctuated erratically and the Canadian dollar displayed a strong undertone.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Nov. 22 -- The United Nations General Assembly adopted today a resolution confirming the new status of Greenland as a part of the Danish realm.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Nov. 22 -- The United Nations General Assembly adopted today a resolution confirming the new status of Greenland as a part of the Danish realm.
docs.abstract: UN Assembly approves resolution asserting its competence to decide when non-self-governing territories achieve self-govt; approves sending UN missions to territories to evaluate situation when status change looms; administering nations opposed

headline.main: GREENLAND STATUS SET; U.N. Adopts Resolution Putting It Under Danish Realm

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Nov. 23 -- A resolution endorsing President Eisenhower's atoms-for-peace program was approved unanimously today by the Political and Security Committee of the United Nations General Assembly. Unanimous adoption by the Assembly...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Nov. 23 -- A resolution endorsing President Eisenhower's atoms-for-peace program was approved unanimously today by the Political and Security Committee of the United Nations General Assembly. Unanimous adoption by the Assembly is expected within a few days.
docs.abstract: Assembly com unanimously approves resolution on agency and internatl scientists conf after rejecting USSR amendments to link agency to Assembly and Security Council and to open conf to all nations; A A Sobolev says USSR vote was for resolutions's principle; silent on whether USSR will join agency; Lodge and Moch defend resolution; Peru pledges material contribution

headline.main: U. N. IS UNANIMOUS IN VOTE ENDORSING U.S. ATOM PROGRAM; Committee Adopts Peace Plan for International Pooling -Soviet Changes Barred U. N. IS UNANIMOUS ON U. S. ATOM PLAN

docs.snippet: Troubles multiplied yesterday for Aristotle Socrates Onassis and his far-flung "empire" of shipping.
docs.lead_paragraph: Troubles multiplied yesterday for Aristotle Socrates Onassis and his far-flung "empire" of shipping.
docs.abstract: Govt sues A S Onassis, 3 other persons and 6 corps for $20 million and return of 16 surplus ships; charges purchasing cos were fraudulently represented as citizen-controlled; 13 of vessels now impounded in libel actions

headline.main: U. S. SUES ONASSIS IN HUGE SHIP DEAL; Asks $20,000,000 and Return of 16 Vessels -- 3 Other Men and 6 Companies Named
